definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Online education gives students enough flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 网上教育使学生们获得了许多灵活性。

sentences.english: Governance should not be a set of static processes without any flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 治理不应该是一组没有任何灵活性的静态过程。

sentences.english: Playing the cymbals can get fingers trained to work independently and build strength.
sentences.chinese: 敲打铜钹可以训练手指灵活性和力量。

sentences.english: This open architecture design provides extensive flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 这种开发式架构设计提供广泛的灵活性。

sentences.english: It includes strategies and skills. The self-regulation theory emphasizes children's activation and flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 自我调控理论强调儿童的能动性和灵活性。

sentences.english: The unique part about the breaststroke kick is the combination of flexibility and the combination of strength.
sentences.chinese: 灵活性和力量的结合是蛙泳蹬腿独特的部分。

sentences.english: The flexibility to do this speaks loudly for the benefits of open spaces.
sentences.chinese: 这种灵活性很大程度上证明了开放空间的好处。

sentences.english: This is to exercise your eye muscles and increase their flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法旨在锻炼眼肌，增强其灵活性。

sentences.english: The cattle-feeding industry will need to be more flexible.
sentences.chinese: 养牛业需要有较大的灵活性。

sentences.english: What if you want the safety and flexibility of actually booting from your portable hard drive?
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要从移动硬盘启动的安全性和灵活性呢？

sentences.english: It must be said in favour of leys that they give much more flexibility in grass land management.
sentences.chinese: 必须充分肯定轮作草场在管理方面有较大的灵活性。

sentences.english: But still the biggest problem is inflexibility.
sentences.chinese: 但最大的问题还是缺乏灵活性。

sentences.english: On the whole, it's well architected and remarkably flexible.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，它有良好的架构和显著的灵活性。

sentences.english: To be a top weightlifter you need allot of overall flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个顶级举重运动员，你需要很强的整体灵活性。

sentences.english: First off, the research highlights the need for greater flexibility for people working full-time.
sentences.chinese: 首先，研究强调全职工作的人需要更多的灵活性。
